aboutUs.title: REG; We work to reduce your waste and enable you to turn it into useful products.
aboutUs.description: In our opinion, waste does not have to be an expense. Instead of the expense of disposing of waste, it is possible to turn them into valuable products. That’s why REG offers washing solutions to produce construction aggregate from waste products.
